publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1847 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremonyâ€”That the Parliament thanks and pays tribute to all those who worked so hard to make the opening of Holyrood such a tremendous success and congratulates the individuals and groups from across Scotland and beyond who took part, including the architects, builders, catering staff, cleaning staff, security staff, performers, artists, musicians, Parliament staff, external staff, local heroes, invited guests and everyone else who contributed to making the opening ceremony such a memorable occasion. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Jim Mather*, Tricia Marwick*, Rob Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Chris Ballance*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mary Scanlon*, Ms Sandra White*, Mike Pringle*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*, Mr John Swinney*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Bill Aitken*, Bruce Crawford*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Murray Tosh*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Robin Harper*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Roseanna Cunningham*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Mr David Davidson*, Trish Godman*, Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Dr Jean Turner*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-1847 Congratulations on Holyrood Opening Ceremony (lodged on 11 October 2004) Linda Fabiani*
